title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Brady Un-retirement Reaction, Nick Wright on LeBron/Lakers Dysfunction, Russ Wilson Top 5 Debate, Aaron Brand Damage
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Brady Un-retirement Reaction, Nick Wright on LeBron/Lakers Dysfunction, Russ Wilson Top 5 Debate, Aaron Brand Damage
description:
Colin reacts to the bombshell Tom Brady announcement that he's unretiring and returning to the Bucs for the 2022 season, why the Browns traded for Amari Cooper even though they're not committed to Baker long-term, and why one college hoops conference is consistently overrated in the NCAA Tourney. (3:00)

Then, First Things First co-host - and host of the What's Wright? podcast - Nick Wright joins Colin to discuss what's behind LeBron's scoring binge (20:00), why the Tom Brady un-retirement rumors have been so persistent (22:00), what's behind the Lakers' prolonged dysfunction (26:00), if Dame Lillard could end up with the Lakers (35:00), if the Warriors are a title contender (38:00), which surprise team Nick thinks could win the West (40:00), if Jayson Tatum can lead the Celtics on a deep playoff run (43:00), if Russell Wilson is still a Top 5 NFL QB (51:00), why Lamar Jackson still hasn't agreed to an extension (

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
